definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: The boulders suddenly disappeared, giving way to a stretch of plain.
sentences.chinese: 突然大石块不见了，前面是一片平地。

sentences.english: We were on the ground floor and when I came to I was lying under a pile of rubble.
sentences.chinese: 我们当时都在第一层，我发现我躺在一堆碎石块下。

sentences.english: They ducked down behind a wall as stones began to fly.
sentences.chinese: 他们在石块飞过来时急忙俯身蹲到一堵墙后。

sentences.english: Use large rocks or tree branches to block the door.
sentences.chinese: 用大的石块或者树枝来封住门。

sentences.english: The catapult shot hundred-pound rocks at the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 弩炮向敌人发射了上百磅石块。

sentences.english: The low walls were made of packed clay and stones.
sentences.chinese: 棚屋矮墙由粘土及石块填充而成。

sentences.english: All of the interior stones fit so well, a card won't fit between them.
sentences.chinese: 内部所有的石块都严丝合缝，连一张卡片都插不进去。

sentences.english: The machine crushed the rocks into powder.
Mine inside bucket is applicable to large stones and so on a larger size of the cargo transport .
sentences.chinese: 矿用铲斗车厢则适用于大石块等粒度较大货物的运输。

sentences.english: Shea thinks our ancestors threw rocks pretty well.
sentences.chinese: 谢伊认为我们的祖先投掷石块的本领相当不错。

sentences.english: The cruel boy threw stones at the frogs.
sentences.chinese: 那一个狠毒的男孩用石块投掷田鸡。

sentences.english: One of the photographers threw stones at the settlers.
sentences.chinese: 录像上，一名摄影记者向定居者投掷石块。

sentences.english: Before planting, Mautner analyzed the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 在种植之前，莫那先分析石块。

sentences.english: Primitive man made himself primitive tools from sharp stones and animal bones .
sentences.chinese: 原始人用尖石块和兽骨为自己制作原始的工具。

sentences.english: A rock-throwing battle erupted between the two sides.
sentences.chinese: 双方之间爆发了一场投掷石块互相攻击的战斗。

sentences.english: Five truck-sized boulders guard four slots.
sentences.chinese: 五个卡车般大小的石块形成了四道狭缝。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
